>>A moment is:<< (x) The tendency of a force to cause an object to rotate ( ) The tendency of a force to cause failure in an object ( ) The tendency of a force to cause an object to translate or move ( ) I don't know
[explanation] A moment is the tendency of a force to cause an object to rotate, which equals the force or load multiplied by the perpendicular distance from the point of support to the applied load. [explanation]
